metadata.title: CVE-2021-42948 on Ubuntu 18.04 FIPS Certified (bionic) - medium
metadata.description: HotelDruid Hotel Management Software v3.0.3 and below was discovered tohave exposed session tokens in multiple links via GET parameters, allowingattackers to access user session id's.

criterions.comment: hoteldruid: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needs-triage').
